name: Pumpkinman
description:
Halloween night is near, it is a time when the world of the living intertwines with the world of the nightmares. Mighty Warlock lurks for Irvinton citizens and only Pumpkinman, a mysterious and thrilling figure, can face him.

Gameplay

  • Made for fans of difficult challenges.
  • Fight with 10 different kind of monsters straight from the nightmares. Each kind of enemy has his unique style.
  • Defeat Warlock in epic boss fight.
  • Combat requires both skill and cleverness.
  • Improve character skills and overcome challenges more efficiently.
  • Travel to many atmospheric locations: graveyards, woods, crypts, and more!
  • Discover 20+ levels in various setting.
